data: This component allows players to set the light level range that causes the mob to spawn.

data.Name: adjust_for_weather
data.Description: This determines if weather can affect the light level conditions that cause the mob to spawn (e.g. Allowing hostile mobs to spawn during the day when it rains.)

data.Name: max
data.Description: This is the maximum light level value that allows the mob to spawn

data.Name: min
data.Description: This is the minimum light level value that allows the mob to spawn
